SimulatorProject.Title: Doodle Training
SimulatorProject.Description: The Toon will automatically train your doodle in estate. Before you click on Start, make sure that • you are in your estate, • you have your doodle menu open (feed/scratch/call) • verify speedchat options (deault assumes you have unite, if you do not have unite then change the 3 to 2 • choose what trick you want - starting index is 0 (deafult chooses 2nd trick in list)
